name: FindDuplicatesByIds

methods.name: findDuplicatesByIds
methods.description: Identifies duplicates of sObjects provided and returns a list of FindDuplicatesResult objects.

params.name: ids
params.description: A list of IDs for which you want to find duplicates.

description: Performs rule-based searches for duplicate records. The input is an array of IDs. Each ID specifies records to search for duplicates among. The duplicates are detected based on the active duplicate rules applicable to the object type corresponding to the input IDs.
